head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KING, KEVIN CHUNG CHI

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KING, KEVIN CHUNG CHI

block.p: KING-Kevin Chung Chi. On May 20, 2000. Beloved son of Chuen Fong and the late Albert. Loving brother of Michael. Reposing at Hillebrand Funeral Homes, 63-17 Woodhaven Boulevard, Rego Park, NY. Visiting Wednesday and Thursday 2-5 and 7-9PM. Mass of Christian Burial Friday 10:45AM. Resurrection Ascension RC Church. Interment is in Lutheran All Faiths Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, please make donations to Stonybrook Foundation in care of Ann Fuhr, 631-632-8550.

In lieu of flowers, please make donations to Stonybrook Foundation in care of Ann Fuhr, 631-632-8550.
